website_summaries.verdict: A behemoth of a tablet for serious iPad users who want a much larger screen, with the hefty price tag to match.
pros: The liquid retina display makes the massive screen seem even bigger
Flawless performance when creating presentations and vector drawings with the 2nd-generation Apple Pencil (not included)
cons: Third-party apps like Excel are kludgy on the iPad despite its improved performance

customer_reviews.title: The 4th Gen 12.9-inch iPad Pro is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the iPad since its initial release 10 years ago in 2010 and have had many devices over the years. My previous iPad was the 11 inch Pro purchased in 2018. This device is the 12.9 inch version with much improved performance and amazing display. In fairness, the iPad will never be a replacement for my desktop Mac or MacBook because it still uses iOS rather than OS but the iPad is my convienient go to daily device. Sold by and supplied by Amazon with fast free delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kaboobi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a drawing tablet primarily for my girlfriend as she wanted to do digital art and her feedback so far since yesterday has been outstanding! The only gripe is that the camera quality is a bit crap compared to our Iphone 7 plus but we're not really going to be taking many photos with this device so we're not too bothered about that. The screen quality is outstanding and quite simply amazing and the Apple pencil works great with it! I'll probably come and update this in a few months after some more substantial usage.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: amazing tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is just the best tablet I have ever had and I have two earlier iPADs, a MAC computer, 3 older iphones before my current one so I really endorse Apple products. The colours on the screen are vibrant, the systems work fast, the iCloud updates keep everything synchronised, I bought a 256GB memory iPAD which means I can download so much more than before. I also bought a keyboard case so I can see the whole screen when I type and I would recommend that if anyone is buying an iPAD, just try and gather the extra money to buy an iPAD PRO
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Gil

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: Not being a techie I wasn't sure what size to get but decided on the 12" instead of the 11" and very pleased with it. Got a cover for it and its still easy to hold. Great for using in the kitchen with a cooking app as screen is so clear. Been playing lots of games too, downloaded about 10 so far and the storage has barely moved. Very quick and easy to use. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie womble

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Great product, much better than the previous generation. Ordered in the afternoon, delivered the following morning, great service.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Holden

customer_reviews.title: One heck of a fathers day gift
customer_reviews.text: I got the 1tb version as my experience with the iPhone 6 years ago was that Apple takes a lot of memory. This was a fathers day gift, he's super pleased. Feedback is that the screen is so clear, playing games is so much easier. Kids also love it, again saying gaming is a much better experience. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: T T

customer_reviews.title: nice machine
customer_reviews.text: nice machine but when it came to setting it up it told me to plug it into my computer-iMac-but the only lead in the box was a C to C lead (for the charger) I need a C to USB lead so I had to order one from Amazon but the lead they sent was only 30cms long to short, I could of done with at least tripple that length, spoilt my experience of Apple products not including the 'USB to C' lead
customer_reviews.author: weblet

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I had my iPad for a while before reviewing it. I can honestly say I am really happy I decided to splurge on it. I purchased it to start digital drawing, and as a sort of laptop replacement (my 8 year old laptop still works, but it's definitely on its last legs!). I've started using my iPad for absolutely everything now! I can draw, play games, stream media, apply for jobs, video chat friends and family and much much more. It's really great for note taking or keeping diaries too. I didn't think I'd use it as much as I do! If you're considering buying one, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Maxime Moone

customer_reviews.title: Lovely ipad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my old iPad got damaged by a repair place. Wasn’t sure I would like it at first as it’s so big compared to my old one. But wow, this is impressive. Battery is good, sound and screen are great. Even the built in dictation is better than my old one. Would recommend. The only thing I didn’t like was the fact the charging cable is so short so you can’t use the iPad when it’s charging and it’s hard to plug-in too because of the cable length.
customer_reviews.author: TJS

customer_reviews.title: Apple are so tight
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best iPad I’ve seen so far but same old thing with Apple you don’t even get a usb-c to normal usb cable which is insane seeing as youve just spent £1600 on a tablet and that silly little thing is why I can’t give the full 5 stars because Apple are so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Good for soft work.
customer_reviews.text: Good if you take it as a large screen iPhone. Bad if you consider it as your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Abbas Wali

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! So much better than my previous iPad. Everything about it from the way it looks, to easy setup, picture quality, cameras. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Winter Rose

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Defective Have purchased a brand new I pad arrived on Monday , it has not switched on when i opened the package. I HAVE CALLED AMAZON AFTER 45 MINUTES THEY TRANSFERRED ME TO APPLE CARE THE PROBLEM IS NOT RESOLVED HAVE BEEN THROUGH THE SAME QUESTIONS 1HR 30 MINUTES LATTER. I SHOULD HAVE PURCHASED FROM JOHN LEWIS , THEY HAVE BETTER CUSTOMER SERVICE , BUT YOU DONT THINK YOU WILL HAVE THIS PROBLEM WITH A NEW PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing piece of kit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the Apple Pencil to work in Photoshop and have loved every minute of it, the screen is gorgeous, watching a movie looks great! Everything is fast, battery lasts forever! 100 out of 10 totally worth its price tag.
customer_reviews.author: BadWolf73

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality and regular updates
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about iPad Pro a bit expensive you have to pay for quality picture fast great camera And tons of other things I probably won’t use great for a uni student even better for a art student .
customer_reviews.author: David Moffat

customer_reviews.title: Great, but just buy the 2018 version
customer_reviews.text: having owned both, I would suggest just buying the 2018 version. Although this iPad is really nice, there is practically no difference between the 2018 and 2020 version. Unless you really need the Lidar sensor, get a refurbished 2018 version and save yourself hundreds.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: STUNNER
customer_reviews.text: YEP ITS NICE. RATHER EXPENSIVE BUT YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. GREAT SCREEN, LIGHT UNIT AND GOOD BUILD QUALITY. APPLE AT ITS BEST. NEEDS TO LAST OVER 24 MONTHS AT THIS PRICE POINT.
customer_reviews.author: Picto69

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace my wife’s earlier model,she has taken to it like a duck to water and is very pleased with it.The need to replace most of our leads etc came as a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: K. Haylock

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad yet
customer_reviews.text: This 2020 iPad Pro 12.9” is the best iPad i have owned and i have had all of them, amazing screen and cameras, do get the magic keyboard also to compliment your iPad
customer_reviews.author: scottywolves

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic upgrade from my 11 inch 2020 model. Love the size for using on my lap. So fast soo smooth for browsing and games.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie waddy

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: can you believe that, after one month, the front camera couldn’t use for the Face ID! Even the apple shop doesn’t know why. They change me a new one, but I must go to another city to pickup! I spend over 1000 pound not for Making myself Trouble !
customer_reviews.author: Aoooozo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get a new iPad as my old one kept dying, this is bigger than the old one and it’s amazing for watching films on thanks to the big screen.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Hubble

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT
customer_reviews.text: A Brilliant Ipad easy to use lots of back up nice picture in picture very clear
customer_reviews.author: keith underdown

customer_reviews.title: The best iPad
customer_reviews.text: The best iPad that i saw. Very big screen and very useful for any kind of activities.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but superb machine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cameras , clear screen, really satisfied with this iPad
customer_reviews.author: cannydrew

customer_reviews.title: Apple crippled its battery life
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when you use Safari. Apart from that, this is an amazing piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: Zel

customer_reviews.title: I pad pro 12.9
customer_reviews.text: Love my i pad pro, perfect for what i need although apple priducts are just so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Angie davies

customer_reviews.title: This I Pad is so much faster.
customer_reviews.text: I have just updated to the I pad pro from my old one I had for 8 years. The new I pad is unbelievable it is so fast, much lighter and amazing. Everything runs so much quicker and I love to sketch. I think I will be using this for another 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Feels premium, great screen and performance is fantastic. Only downside - I wish it had two ports instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The best Tablet/Computer in the world
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product. Wow, I upgraded from the iPad Air 2019 and it’s a huge huge upgrade. Can’t get enough of it! I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nikos Vourkas

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I have bought for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Justilookin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned this product to Amazon, as I had purchased from a different provider in the end, but I do love the Ipad 12.9 2020, i upgraded from the Ipad 2019 10.2. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MR C.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a chopping board, does everything they say it does.
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a chopping board, does everything they say it does.
customer_reviews.author: Autotrader London

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this and I’m happy to say it will replace my lap top from now on
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: The Product is Ok and does what it should do! Entertain me!
customer_reviews.text: The Product is Ok and does what it should do! Entertain me!
customer_reviews.author: e2783

customer_reviews.title: A womderful device
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality! The function is amazing. Consider the 2020 version if you don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Best of two worlds
customer_reviews.text: So Happy! Functional as a laptop and the best drawing tablet available. Perfect for my job as a designer and creative.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: New iPad
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the new iPad, still getting to know it , Amazons great price ,and next day delivery, by our friendly Post lady. Can’t ask for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Faulty ipad
customer_reviews.text: Item is faulty , shuts down of its own accord . Screen goes blank for no reason . Item not fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Brodie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from 11” and not disappointed, the upgraded camera is fab
customer_reviews.author: Luke Watson

customer_reviews.title: iPad Pro 12.9
customer_reviews.text: I no longer to return this item as the problem has resolved itself thanks for your assistance. John Eales
